question: You ordered an item from an online shopping store and it has arrived damaged.Write a letter to the retailer to complain. In your letter:• Explain why you are unhappy• Request a refund• Make arrangements to return the damaged item
text: I am writing this letter to draw your attention to the poor quality packing of the blender I order. I had placed an online item but the glass material was cracked. My serial number was MX6549 and I ordered it on 20 March.

I am very disappointed because I wanted to gift this to my friend at her wedding which has now passed. Moreover, I expected the article to be packed tightly with material that could protect the glass but when I opened the box I was shocked. I was very confused and had to arrange another gift for my friend on the spot.

Therefore, I would appreciate it if you make a 100% refund to me as this was not my mistake. Further, I would be thankful if you make an appropriate arrangements to returning of the item. I hope you will solve my problem.

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article an may not be required with the plural noun arrangements in this sentence. Consider removing the article, or changing the noun to singular.
